articles.description: Parasite director Bong Joon-Ho’s next film, titled Mickey 17, is based on Edward Ashton’s 2022 novel Mickey 7. Now in production, it stars Robert Pattison, Marvel Cinematic Universe star Mark Ruffalo, Nope’s Steven Yeun, Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker’s Nao…
articles.content:
His sci-fi movie Mickey 17 is planned for release in March 2024

articles.title: Blade’s crush on Capt. Marvel is the most adorbs part of Midnight Suns - Polygon
articles.description: Marvel’s Midnight Suns players have come across scenes and dialogue where Blade none-too-subtly reveals he has a thing for Captain Marvel. It’s part of the strategy video game’s “live among the heroes” social encounters.
articles.content: Marvel fans enjoying Marvels Midnight Sunsare having a lot of schoolyard fun, having discovered a dialogue option in the game that makes it super clear that vampire-hunter Blade has the hots for Capt… [+2502 chars]

articles.title: Is The Rock on steroids? Joe Rogan wants ‘massive’ WWE star to ‘come clean right now’ - MMA Mania
articles.description: Video: Joe Rogan believes “Black Adam” star “The Rock” is on steroids and should come clean about supplementation like “Liver King” did after previously denying his drug use.
